sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useGitHub } from '../../hooks/github_hooks'; import * as S from './styled' export const Profile = () => { const {gitHubState} = useGitHub() useEffect(() => { console.log(gitHubState.user); }, [gitHubState.user]); return(

{gitHubState.user.name}

UserName:

{gitHubState.user.login}

Followers

{gitHubState.user.followers}

Followings

{gitHubState.user.following}

Gists

{gitHubState.user.public_gists}

Repositories

{gitHubState.user.public_repos}
) }
